forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: we can make random variables, why not make it so the time between states can-

comments.text: also be randomized, like become state 2 in (0 120) min max, which allows for a randomized fun effect
yes please, not being able to insert variables into things like this severely limits how useful they are. time between states, emitted speed, propelling force, trail duration, etc.

thread.latestCommentText: yes please, not being able to insert variables into things like this severely limits how useful they are.
